title: Anish Rao
text: Hello! I am a Data-driven Business Analyst with an M.Sc. in Data Analytics and 2.5+ years of experience in Software Engineering. I specialize in bridging the gap between technical code and business strategy, using data storytelling to drive informed decision-making.

title: Anish Rao
text:
Featured Projects

Customer Churn Prediction (Final M.Sc. Project): An interactive Streamlit application using Explainable AI (SHAP) to identify causal drivers of churn in Telecom and Insurance sectors. View Project
FIFA Player Analytics (Data Viz): A comprehensive Tableau & Power BI dashboard suite analyzing global player statistics to identify high-value talent. View Dashboard`
NYC Taxi Operational Intelligence (Data Storage): A full-scale Data Warehouse proof-of-concept using a Star Schema, SQL Server, and Neo4j to derive business intelligence from complex urban transport data. View Case Study
